DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine impact Pono Choices among youth teen pregnancy STI prevention measure : initiation sexual activity ; engagement high risk sexual behavior ; knowledge pregnancy STI prevention ; attitude toward healthy sexual behavior ; skill manage relationship choice ; intention future sexual activity .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Pono Choices : A Culturally Responsive Teen Pregnancy STI Prevention Program
DOC.detailed_description: The study use cluster randomize control design evaluate impact Pono Choices . Thirty-six middle school Hawaii randomly assign participate either treatment control school . Treatment school teacher train deliver Pono Choices . Control school teacher receive train choose middle school sexual health education curriculum . Over 1,700 7th 8th grade student 34 Hawaii school enrol study . As part study , student invite participate baseline follow-up survey . The student survey response use determine impact Pono Choices teen pregnancy STI prevention measure .
